description: Irie is the drummer of http://anidb.net/ch15363 [Girls Dead Monster] who, despite being dead herself, is bad with hearing stories about ghosts or spirits, which http://anidb.net/ch15361 [Sekine] likes to take advantage of. She is best friends with http://anidb.net/ch15361 [Sekine] and joined http://anidb.net/ch15363 [Girls Dead Monster] at the same time as her. Her full name is Irie Miyuki.
name: Irie Miyuki
